name: Pils al Pastor

ingredients.name: La Boite 37 spice and salt blend

preparation:
Ancho chile liqueur, tart drinking vinegar and a cap of pilsner give this cocktail its fizzy kick.

Rim a rocks glass with spice and salt blend.

Add tequila, liqueur, lime juice and vinegar into a shaker with ice and shake well.

Strain into prepared glass over fresh ice.

Top with pilsner.
